title: Condition :- The concerned land owners/users are prohibited to discharge any Garbage / Water Sewage / Wastage in the reservoir, generating from its premises
clause_text: Condition :- The concerned land owners/users are prohibited to discharge any Garbage / Water Sewage / Wastage in the reservoir, generating from its premises. It will be compulsory and binding on the land owner / user to make necessary arrangements within the premises for Water and sewage disposal management and to maintain the Zero Discharge condition at his own cost.
section: Distance from Natural Lake and Dam

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
